title: Wall Street Journal: FBI Facilitated Ransom Payment For Weinstein
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block speaks with Adam Entous, a correspondent for the Wall Street Journal, about his report on the FBI's role in arranging a ransom to al-Qaida to help free hostage Warren Weinstein.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
